_header: On Her is all my life i-long
Note:
Critical edition Dobson and Harrison (1979)
XEric John Dobson, and F. L. Harrison. Medieval English Songs. New York: Cambridge UP, 1979, 130-1.
Subjects: Virgin Mary, prayers to; prayers, to Virgin Mary; songs
_description: An orison to the Virgin Mary — five 10-line stanzas (ababababab)

OxfJesus29.First Lines:
ON hire is al my lif i longof hwam ich wille
                    synge…
OxfJesus29.Last Lines: …Nu and euer moTo longe Ich habbe soth ibeo…
OxfJesus29.Editions:
Morris,  Richard,

             An Old English Miscellany: A Bestiary, Kentish Sermons, Proverbs of

EETS

CamTCC323.First Lines:
On hire is al mi lif ylongOf vam ic wille singenAnd herien him
                    þer among…
CamTCC323.Last Lines: …Of my lif ic ne recchelauedi merci

BLCottCalAIX.First Lines: On hire is al mi lif ilongOf hƿam ich wule singe…
BLCottCalAIX.Last Lines: …For mine sunnes ich am soriOf þis ƿorld ich ne reccheleudi merci amen
